argument.name: Status
argument.description: The status of a shipment sent through FEDEX. Character

argument.name: tracking_num
argument.description: The tracking number of a shipment sent through FEDEX. Character

page.description: Contacts the FedEx web site and looks up the status of the specified tracking number
page.discussion: The FEDEX_Delivery_Status() function contacts the FedEx web site and looks up the status of a shipment sent through FedEx. Note : Use of this function requires an active Internet connection. Desktop applications only.
